name: Glazed In Glow Bestselling Cleansing & Hydrating Duo
about: What it is:A limited-edition travel-size duo that keeps skin balanced, cleansed, and hydrated..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- S6Pro Complex: Proprietary super six blend of prebiotics and probiotic extracts to improve skin smoothness and maintain skin balance..Ingredient Callouts:These products are cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:TULAu2019s #1 cleanser washes away dirt, impurities, and makeup without stripping skin, while their #1 moisturizer is clinically shown to provide all-day hydration..This Set Contains:- 0.49 oz/ 14 mL 24-7 Moisture Hydrating Day & Night Cream.Clean at Sephora

how_to_use: Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing set! The sizes are good and the products work.
